text: Sedina pratyeke'i ya kichu se bhala kaja kareche; cokhera samane dekhate pabe ebam ya kichu manda kaja kareche ta'o, ora takhana kamana karabe, yadi tara ebam esaba karmera madhye byabadhana durera hato! Allaha tamra nijera samparke tomadera sabadhana karachena. Allaha tamra bandadera prati atyanta dayalu.
